1010000000001101 0100001000011000 0 -> sum: 1110001000100101, cout: 0
0011101100000101 1011001001010111 1 -> sum: 1110110101011101, cout: 0
1010101001111100 0100000010101101 0 -> sum: 1110101100101001, cout: 0
0111011011110011 1111000011100111 0 -> sum: 0110011111011010, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
